text: Madekwe ro bvisa mulaedza malugana na hovhu vhuleme ho ri welaho fhano Afrika Tshipembe malugana na heḽi dwadze ḽihulwane ḽa coronavirus. Ndo amba nga uri ndi ḓuvha ḽa vhuraru mulovha ro vala shango heḽi ḽa hashu.
